String getMessage(Culture culture,
                  GlobalLabel localResource,

Returns:

getMessage

String getMessage(GlobalLabel localResource,
                  boolean asMnemonic)
Returns the localized text for a given localResource. If parameter asMnemonic is false the mnemonic indicators are removed prior of returning the result. The locale used for translation is gathered from getApplicationLocaleModel

Parameters:
localResource -
asMnemonic -
